message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll love!  I'm asking for $140 for it.  Let me know what you think!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $120 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my original asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $130.  What do you think?
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $125 for the product.
